[[Category:Scripting Commands Arma 3|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on May 8, 2016 - 18:00 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:IT07|IT07]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Because of AG (Arguments Global), you can use this command to remove the backpack from UNITS that are local as well as REMOTE.
<code>[[removeBackpackGlobal]] UNIT;</code> where UNIT can be a local and/or REMOTE player and/or AI
</dd>
</dl>
